trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template SNMP Ruckus Zonedirector:ruckusZDWLANAPStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].regexp(^Connect$)}=0)or({Template SNMP Ruckus Zonedirector:ruckusZDWLANAPName[{#SNMPVALUE}].regexp($blablablabla^)}=1) or ({Template SNMP Ruckus Zonedirector:ruckusZDWLANAPGroup[{#SNMPVALUE}].regexp($blablablabla^)}=1)
trigger_prototype.name: Wifi {ITEM.VALUE2} indisponível. Endereço físico {#SNMPVALUE}. Grupo {ITEM.VALUE3}

discovery_rule.name: Ruckus APs NN
discovery_rule.description: Not normalized discovery, to use with Grafana.
